hero.title: Creating custom designs for people who value their time
hero.text: I'll provide a step-by-step plan from idea to renovation implementation during a free consultation

buttonNotes.bottom: and does not oblige you to anything

stagesList.stageText: Consulting online, offline, or on-site. We discuss your wishes and needs, I give recommendations and advice on the design of your home
We sign a contract. Fill out a questionnaire to consider all your wishes regarding the interior: room functionality, style, color solutions
I take measurements of your site
I create three layout options for furniture arrangement with the refinement of the chosen one
I develop a custom design concept that reflects the overall stylistic of the interior and color solutions. I present it in the form of collages for each room
I create photorealistic 3D images. I elaborate the interior in a real space
I prepare a full set of drawings to implement the design project
I make an estimate for finishing materials, furniture items, lighting with price indications and stores. I take into account your budget
I send you the design project in digital format and a paper copy for your builders
During the renovation, I monitor the construction work to ensure it matches the design project
I choose the best supplier offers for finishing materials, furniture items, and lighting. I handle the purchasing, logistics, and claims
I work with proven construction teams

metadata.title: Varicose Vein Treatment in Kyiv | Vascular Surgeon - Sergii Voitsitskyi
metadata.description: Consultation with a phlebologist. Effective varicose vein treatment, modern equipment, comfortable conditions. Affordable price. Treatment for thrombosis.
